mapper.select: select distinct A.notice_board_no, A.writer, A.corrector, A.title, A.create_date, A.correct_date, A.hits, A.content, A.is_inactive, (select count(*) from comment A where A.notice_board_no = B.notice_board_no) comment_count from notice_board A left join comment B on A.notice_board_no = B.notice_board_no where is_inactive = 0 limit #{num},20
select count(*) from notice_board where is_inactive = 0;
select notice_board_no, writer, corrector, title, create_date, correct_date, hits, content, is_inactive from notice_board where notice_board_no = ${id}
update notice_board set is_inactive = 0 where notice_board_no = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into notice_board values (default, #{writer}, null, #{title} ,#{createDate}, null, 0, #{content}, false, (select IFNULL(max(notice_board_no), 0) + 1 FROM notice_board AS temp), 0, 0);
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board set corrector = #{corrector}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, correct_date = now() WHERE notice_board_no = ${id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE notice_board set is_inactive = true WHERE reply_ref = ${id}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice_board SET reply_ord = reply_ord + 1 WHERE reply_ref = #{originRef} AND reply_ord > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice_board VALUES (default, #{postTitle.writer}, null, #{postTitle.title}, #{postTitle.createDate}, null, 0, #{postTitle.content}, false, #{postTitle.replyRef}, (SELECT reply_ord FROM notice_board AS temp WHERE notice_board_no = #{postTitle.replyRef})+1, (SELECT reply_depth FROM notice_board AS temp WHERE notice_board_no = #{parentNo}) +1)
